content: Judgment on Israel's Enemies
For the  has an eye on mankind
and on Hamath also, which borders on it,
Tyre has built herself a rampart
But behold, the Lord will strip her of her possessions
The Coming King of Zion
Rejoice greatly, O daughter of Zion!
Behold, your king is coming to you;
humble and mounted on a donkey,
I will cut off the chariot from Ephraim
and the battle bow shall be cut off,
his rule shall be from sea to sea,
As for you also, because of the blood of my covenant with you,
Return to your stronghold, O prisoners of hope;
For I have bent Judah as my bow;
I will stir up your sons, O Zion,
The Lord Will Save His People
Then the  will appear over them,
the Lord  will sound the trumpet
The  of hosts will protect them,
and they shall drink and roar as if drunk with wine,
